mapper.select: select distinct m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from sys_menu m where m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.visible = 0 order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select distinct m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join sys_role ro on ur.role_id = ro.role_id left join sys_user u on ur.user_id = u.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId} and m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.visible = 0 AND ro.status = 0 order by m.parent_id, m.order_num
